name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Salesforce Developer with 10+ years of experience delivering exceptional software solutions within healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Salesforce**, **Apex**, **Lightning**, **LWC**, and adept at integrating **REST API** and **Web Services**. Experienced in utilizing **Mulesoft**, **Boomi**, and **Informatica** to streamline processes and enhance system integration. Demonstrated skills in **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, **jQuery**, and **Ajax** for developing responsive and user-friendly interfaces. Skilled in Agile methodologies fostering collaboration and timely project delivery. 
Possesses a robust background in developing cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, with hands-on expertise in modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Experienced in leading enterprise platform development that incorporates **AI/ML** for optimized automation and real-time analytics. Strong understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Committed to building secure, maintainable solutions that generate real-world impact.
